fields.description: The scope of this project includes:  Beamline Optics, Endstation hardware (SAM automounter, HC1, Vortex, MD2, etc.) , EPICS and EDM related issues, any other miscellaneous hardware issues related to the CMCF-BM beamline specifically.
fields.name: CMCF-BM

fields.description: The scope of this project includes:  Endstation hardware (Exposure Box, goniometer, cryojet, etc.), POE hardware , EDM Screens ;  any other miscellaneous issue related to the CMCF-ID beamline specifically.
fields.name: CMCF-ID

fields.description: The scope of this project includes all user software: MxDC, AutoProcess, third-party software for users such s HKL2000, XDS, CCP4 etc.
fields.name: CMCF User Software

fields.description: Preventative maintenance items related to the CMCF Facility as a whole, affecting both CMCF-BM and CMCF-ID beamlines.
fields.name: CMCF Maintenance

fields.description:
The BPMs currently produce total counts or current as the readout 
value. We should prepare a calibration curve and convert these 
values to flux units so that users have a more useful and 
recognizable value.
fields.title: Convert BPM I0 into flux units

fields.description:
Rayonix advises that the PCC Compact Coolers only have a service 
life of 5-6 years and the coolers have been in service for this 
length of time. Replacement is advises by Rayonix.

Additionally, the temperature logs indicate that Cryo1 is slowly 
losing cooling power and has increased in temperature from -138C to 
-107C. Condenstate (oil) is likely contaminating the cold head.
fields.title: Detector PCC Compact Cooler contamination/relacement
